title: 820-00165 chime and then shuts down
message: Hi Guys I have another 00165, no signs of liquid damage, all voltages are there (i get a spinning fan but not 3 x reboot not sure this model does that as well same as 3437?). The Mac chimes, I see the back light turning on but no apple logo appears and it then shuts down and wont turn on again unless disconnecting all power. Any ideas?

title: 820-00165 chime and then shuts down
message:
These do not do the 3x power on cycle. 
This is a weird issue, have you disconnected everything, SSD,LCD, everything. See if it stays on then.

title: 820-00165 chime and then shuts down
message: Yes i disconnected everything, and tried it also with the board installed. Tried a PRAM reset as well. It shuts before the Apple logo appears. Will see if I can find some short in any line.

title: 820-00165 chime and then shuts down
message: I found a short on pin 2 of L7310 and L7320 (diode mode)

title: 820-00165 chime and then shuts down
message:
That is CPU Vcore and there is no short there as the board would never work like that.

AS you still get an apple logo you did not disconnect the SSD.....

title: 820-00165 chime and then shuts down
message: No there is no apple logo it shuts down before the Apple logo

title: 820-00165 chime and then shuts down
message: Is the SSD disconnected? Disconnect LCD too and see if it still shuts down. Any history on the board?
